translations: 储仓；（商业银行所提供的）周转性短期贷款
把……存入仓库；使落栈（warehouse 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: All donations go toward the cost of warehousing.
sentences.translation: 所有捐款都用作仓库贮存费用。

sentences.sentence: We will ship out the packed cargo as soon as possible, unless the customer requires a special warehousing service.
sentences.translation: 除客人特别要求仓储服务外，亚东货运会将已包装的物品尽快付运。
